description: Skip the takeaway with this lighter and more delicious slow cooker sweet and sour pork recipe.
name: Slow Cooker Sweet & Sour Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 capsicums, red and green, cored and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan and cook the pork for 2-3 minutes until sealed on all sides.
Tip the pork into the slow cooker with onion, garlic, ginger, chilli, stock, ketchup, vinegar, honey and soy sauce, stir well and cook on high for 2.5 hours with the lid on.
Add the diced capsicums and cook for 40 minutes more. Whisk the cornflour with 1 tablespoon of water in a small bowl, stir into the sauce and cook, stirring, until thickened.
